channel.title: GitHub Go Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Go in GitHub

item.title: evanw/esbuild
item.description: An extremely fast JavaScript bundler and minifier

item.title: keybase/client
item.description: Keybase Go Library, Client, Service, OS X, iOS, Android, Electron

item.title: rancher/k3s
item.description: Lightweight Kubernetes

item.title: hoanhan101/ultimate-go
item.description: Ultimate Go study guide

item.title: caddyserver/caddy
item.description: Fast, multi-platform web server with automatic HTTPS

item.title: dapr/dapr
item.description: Dapr is a portable, event-driven, runtime for building distributed applications across cloud and edge.

item.title: kubernetes/enhancements
item.description: Enhancements tracking repo for Kubernetes

item.title: unknwon/the-way-to-go_ZH_CN
item.description: 《The Way to Go》中文译本，中文正式名《Go 入门指南》

item.title: minio/minio
item.description: MinIO is a high performance object storage server compatible with Amazon S3 APIs

item.title: casbin/casbin
item.description: An authorization library that supports access control models like ACL, RBAC, ABAC in Golang

item.title: ory/kratos
item.description: Never build user login, user registration, 2fa, profile management ever again! Works on any operating system, cloud, with any programming language, user interface, and user experience! Written in Go.

item.title: kubernetes/autoscaler
item.description: Autoscaling components for Kubernetes

item.title: flipped-aurora/gin-vue-admin
item.description: 基于gin+vue搭建的后台管理系统框架，集成jwt鉴权，权限管理，动态路由，分页封装，多点登录拦截，资源权限，上传下载，代码生成器，表单生成器等基础功能，更多功能正在开发中，欢迎issue和pr~

item.title: gohugoio/hugo
item.description: The world’s fastest framework for building websites.

item.title: spf13/viper
item.description: Go configuration with fangs

item.title: hashicorp/nomad
item.description: Nomad is an easy-to-use, flexible, and performant workload orchestrator that can deploy a mix of microservice, batch, containerized, and non-containerized applications. Nomad is easy to operate and scale and has native Consul and Vault integrations.

item.title: GoAdminGroup/go-admin
item.description: A golang framework helps gopher to build a data visualization and admin panel in ten minutes

item.title: ethereum/go-ethereum
item.description: Official Go implementation of the Ethereum protocol

item.title: kubernetes-sigs/kustomize
item.description: Customization of kubernetes YAML configurations

item.title: segmentio/kafka-go
item.description: Kafka library in Go

item.title: gomodule/redigo
item.description: Go client for Redis

item.title: nektos/act
item.description: Run your GitHub Actions locally 🚀

item.title: TheAlgorithms/Go
item.description: Algorithms Implemented in GoLang

item.title: spf13/cobra
item.description: A Commander for modern Go CLI interactions

item.title: esrrhs/pingtunnel
item.description: 流量转发加速工具.a tool that advertises tcp/udp/socks5 traffic as icmp traffic for forwarding.
